code: var remoteURL="https://nss-day-cohort-44.github.io/";export default{get:function get(tableName,id){return fetch("".concat(remoteURL,"/").concat(tableName,"/").concat(id)).then(function(result){return result.json();});},getAll:function getAll(tableName){return fetch("".concat(remoteURL,"/").concat(tableName)).then(function(result){return result.json();});},delete:function _delete(tableName,id){return fetch("http://localhost:5002/".concat(tableName,"/").concat(id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(function(result){return result.json();});},post:function post(tableName,newObject){return fetch("".concat(remoteURL,"/").concat(tableName),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(newObject)}).then(function(data){return data.json();});},update:function update(tableName,editedObject){return fetch("".concat(remoteURL,"/").concat(tableName,"/").concat(editedObject.id),{method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(editedObject)}).then(function(data){return data.json();});},getEmployeesWithAnimals:function getEmployeesWithAnimals(id){return fetch("".concat(remoteURL,"/employees/").concat(id,"?_embed=animals")).then(function(result){return result.json();});}};
